dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: The CIFAR10 dataset consists of 60,000 32 × 32 RGB color images categorized into 10 different classes. The training and testing set consist of 50,000 and 10,000 samples respectively.
dcterms:title: CIFAR10

dcterms:creator: H. Xiao
K. Rasul
R. Vollgraf
dcterms:description: The Fashion MNIST dataset consists of 70,000 grayscale images with 28 × 28 pixels forming 10 classes. This dataset is divided into two parts with 60,000 images in the training set and 10,000 images in the testing set.
dcterms:title: Fashion MNIST

dcterms:creator: P. Bergmann
M. Fauser
D. Sattlegger
C. Steger
dcterms:description: The MVTec AD dataset is a comprehensive collection of defect-free and defective images of various object types and materials, designed to facilitate the development and evaluation of anomaly-detection algorithms in the scenario of industrial inspection.
dcterms:title: MVTec AD

dcterms:description: The WTBI dataset was collected from the SCADA system of wind turbine units. This dataset consists of SCADA information from multiple turbines within a wind farm, collected over a duration of two months. The data in WTBI dataset are divided into two categories, i.e. non-icing period and icing period, with the non-icing and icing periods identified as normal and abnormal states respectively.
dcterms:title: Wind Turbine Blade Icing (WTBI)
